ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENT
ack.p: This work was supported by the Natural Science Foundation of China (No. U1805235), the Science and Technology Project of Xiamen City (No. 3502Z20183029), the Open Fund of the Key Laboratory of Pollination Insect Biology of the Ministry of Agriculture (No. 2016MFNZS04), and Jimei University Cultivation Project of National Foundation (No. ZP2020033).
